title: Understanding SQL
text: SQL stands for Structured Query Language. It is used to communicate with databases and perform tasks such as retrieving data, updating records, and managing database structures.

title: Importance of Practice
text: Practicing SQL involves writing queries to solve real-world problems. This helps in understanding how to structure queries and retrieve the desired data efficiently.

hintAnswer: Practice translating questions into structured queries.
title: Choosing a Learning Strategy
text: Consider which strategy would be most effective for learning SQL.
choices: Practice translating questions into structured queries.
Examine a case study in detail.
